GapFillDragDrop.Title: It's time, I'd rather, I'd better
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on the correct word or phrase and drag it to the correct gap.

Content.Question:
1 It's time we phoned for a taxi.
2 I'd rather you came later in the day.
3 You had better ask the manager's permission before you start.
4 If you ask me it's high time you started taking this course seriously.
5 My sister would rather spend her money on holidays than on new clothes.
6 She'd better ask the technician to look at it.
7 Would you rather I sent my reply by email?
8 You'd better phone the airport and ask them when the flight is expected.
9 I'd rather you didn't smoke inside the house.
10 It's about time you spent some money on smart clothes. You look a mess!
